Quiz.question: 1.Which of the following is true about incidents?

choice.c: c.It is hazardous in nature and usually leads to accidents

Quiz.question: 2.What is the purpose of having accident models?

choice.a: a.It is for inputting data to generate outcome
choice.b: b.It is for risk analysis and risk management of the human systems
choice.c: c.It is used as part of checklist and part of operation

Quiz.question: 3.Which of the following is true about air accident?

choice.a: a.It happens as a consequence of planned and deliberate activities
choice.b: b.It takes place in the air only
choice.c: c.It involves injury as well as damage of property

Quiz.question: 4.What is the course of action after occurrence of an accident?
5.Which of the following is not a name of an accident model?
6.Which of the following statement is TRUE?

choice.a: a.Incident always end up as accidents
choice.b: b.Incidents, if handled correctly lead to investigation
choice.c: c.Incidents are events that are unexpected and have negative consequences
